fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Choose a target at night. ||If they're evil||, you will attack them ||and one other evil player visiting them.||

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Text in ||Spoilertext|| does not count as part of your role.
-During the day, **Unleash**, allowing you to use your ability twice the next night and act as if it had the text in ||Spoilertext||.
